Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“The hills are alive with the sound of nasty murder-bugs. ‘Tis the season to hunt hatchlings before they eat your pets and children. Join us. Slay the hopperhound young before they grow deadly enough to eat you. Everyone grab a gun. You can’t slay them alone. They are deadly. They can leap and slash like any hopperhound. Meet at the Community Center on Bugsday Morning. Don’t forget the Bugsday Evening Feast and scrumptious Barbeque Bugs! Eat them before they eat you!”— Mayor Keat Hatyara, “RV-1943D: Bugsday Festival Announcement”
“山里面到处是恶毒的杀人蝗虫发出的声音。为了保护你的宠物与孩子，必须猎杀它们的幼虫。加入我们，趁它们还不够致命没法将你生吞之前，消灭那些跳蝗幼虫。所有人都拿上枪，单打独斗你们毫无胜算。它们非常致命，跳跃的高度和攻击力度与正常的跳蝗无异。请在害虫日早晨到社区中心集合，别忘了害虫日晚宴和美味的跳蝗烧烤！在它们吃掉你之前，先吃掉它们！”- 市长基特·哈特亚拉，“RV-1943D：害虫日庆典公告”

“I remember the first year in Sundew Valley in the farming colony. The rich soil and favorable climate made life ideal for growing crops. Our community grew strong as we lived our happy lives one bounteous harvest after the next. We prospered for a decade spreading out over the valley until something wicked awoke in Hopper Hill. A Manhunter. Green and covered in spines, its legs were scythes, leaping across our fields. It cares nothing for our crops. It hungers for the men who cultivate the land. We are its crop.”— Patchery Mazz, “RV-6988D: The Surrender of Sundew Valley”

“我还记得第一年来到桑德鲁峡谷的农业殖民地时，这里肥沃的土壤和怡人的气候简直就是种植作物的天堂。作物的收成一年比一年丰厚，我们的社区也变得越来越强大，生活也越来越幸福。我们的兴旺持续了十年，直至某种邪恶的生物在漏斗山中苏醒：猎人跳蝗。它翠绿的身体上布满脊刺，腿部犹如镰刀一般锋利。它跃向我们的田地却丝毫不在乎我们的粮食，它渴望的是那些种植粮食的农夫。我们就是它的粮食。”- 帕齐里·马兹，“RV-6988D：桑德鲁峡谷的沦陷”

“The bright red carapace clicked. It inched backwards against the cliff wall. It was the largest hopperhound we’d seen in generations. Long bloody slashes adorned the few remaining hunting dogs that brayed at it. The townsfolk closed in, raising their rifles for the kill. The first shot cracked the air, but the huge red hopper was already gone. It leapt over the dogs and encroaching villagers, striking a soldier. The man fell flat, dropping his weapon, as the creature's razor-sharp claws stabbed at him.”— Brian Froden, “RV-3480E: Hunting Bugs on the Frontier”

“亮红色的甲壳咔嚓咔嚓地响着，它倚着崖壁向后走去。这是我们几代以来见过的体型最大的跳蝗。仅剩的几条猎犬身上布满了血淋淋的伤口，正朝它狂吠不已。镇民们举起了手中的步枪步步紧逼，想要干掉眼前这只跳蝗。第一枪轰然响起，但那巨大的红色跳蝗早已不见了踪影。它跃过了猎犬和逐渐靠近的村民，向一位士兵发起了袭击。剃刀般锋利的爪子已经深深划入了士兵的身体，他应声倒地，手中的武器也掉到了地上。”- 布里安·弗洛登，“RV-3480E：边境猎虫”
Edit: as its -> as the creature's

“If it wasn’t so murderous, I’d be excited about it. The hopperhound Eviscerator is the most aggressive carnivorous insectoid across the galaxy. This galactic infestation has intelligently hitchhiked onto vessels to nearly every colony the Star Union has touched. We originally thought hopperhound eggs were smuggled by rival malefactors to torment each other. My studies of the Eviscerator show it possesses predatory restraint sufficient to infest the galaxy using its own cleverness. Every time I encounter one, I can’t help but wonder if I’m staring at my death.”— Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-192S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”

“如果它不是那么嗜杀成性，我会对它非常感兴趣。跳蝗开膛手是整个银河中最具攻击性的肉食性类昆虫。这一星系祸害巧妙地利用来往的船只几乎到达了星际联盟接触过的所有殖民地。我们一开始还以为跳蝗卵是敌对分子偷运过来的。通过我对开膛手的研究，它们具备抑制自己捕猎冲动的能力，并运用自己的智慧在整个星系中滋生。每次遇到开膛手，我都会忍不住去想，我是不是正在凝视死神。”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-192S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”

Experimental Hopperhound created by the Star Union to serve as a weapon. Subdermal implants make it more resistant than normal specimens and a unique modification to their respiratory system gives them access to Thermal attacks.
由星际联盟创造的实验跳蝗，用来当作武器使用。皮下植入物使它能够承受比一般物种更多的伤害，针对呼吸系统进行的特殊改造使得它们能够发动热能攻击。
